comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Jenkin Lloyd Jones (1843-1918), Unitarian minister, social reformer. His (second) wife was the former Edith Lackersteen, a long-time co-worker. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenkin_Lloyd_Jones He was on Henry Ford's peace ship Oscar II, see The New York Times, January 3, 1916

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for the additional information about Jones.  We'll include it in our next update.
